body.p: South Ridge Mr. and Mrs. Rudolph Brandau and family, Miss Elate Ruff, Henry Brandau and Edna, also Mr. and Mrs. Elmer Brandau were Sparta callers during the week. Henry Brandau and Harold, also Elmer Brandau, were business callers at Mrs. Huffâ€™s Saturday afternoon. Henry Brandau and Rev. Monhardt drove to Milwaukee on business Monday. Dr. Rice was called to John Beiers one day of last week. Mrs. Pat Haney was called to see her brother, Charlie March, at Ontario, who is not well.
